pages.title: Pandora Tower
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Spawn locations: Birch Forest, Dark Forest, Forest, Flower Forest, Grove, Mangrove Swamp, Old Growth Birch Forest, Plains, Savanna, Savanna Plateau, Sunflower Plains, Swamp, Windswept Savanna$(br2)Includes a $(l:build/mobs/touto_guardian)Touto Guardian$(/l) spawner$(br)Includes a $(l:build/mobs/hokuto_guardian)Hokuto Guardian$(/l) spawner$(br)Includes a $(l:build/mobs/seito_guardian)Seito Guardian$(/l) spawner$(br)Includes a $(l:build/mobs/hard_guardian)Hard Guardian$(/l) spawner$(br2)Includes a $(l:misc/boss_blocks/evol_boss_block)Evol Boss Block$(/l)
